main: Heals SP to allies with his S3 and passive. The passive heals more with Reson and heals 2 allies at 4+ {keyword:Wrath} Reson.

1011201.desc:
Turn End: heal 1 ally with the least SP by (5 + highest Reson.) (max 10) (excludes: self and Panicked or E.G.O Corroded allies)
- If the said ally has Base Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency or Count, heal 5 additional SP to them
1011201.name: Inner Ardor

1011211.desc:
Turn End: heal 1 ally with the least SP by (5 + highest Reson.) (max 10) (excludes: self and Panicked or E.G.O Corroded allies)
- If the said ally has Base Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency or Count, heal 5 additional SP to them
- At 4+ Wrath Reson., heal 1 additional ally
1011211.name: Inner Ardor

1011221.desc: For 2 allies with the least SP: if they lost SP this turn, heal 5 SP at Turn End
1011221.name: Liu Defensive Square

1011231.desc:
For 2 allies with the least SP: if they lost SP this turn, heal 5 SP at Turn End
- If the said allies have Base Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency or Count, heal 5~10 SP instead
1011231.name: Liu Defensive Square

data.desc:
If target has 6+ [Combustion], Coin Power +1
Deal +10% damage for every 6 [Combustion] on target (max 30%)
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP for 1 other ally with the least SP
- If this attack killed the target, or if target had 10+ [Combustion], heal 1 more ally
data.name: Flow of the Sword

Deal +10% damage for every 6 [Combustion] on target (max 30%)
[EndSkill] Heal 15 SP for 1 other ally with the least SP
- If this attack killed the target, or if target had 10+ [Combustion], heal 1 more ally
data.name: Flow of the Sword
